title: What salary is given to a fresher at Cognizant? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello,Dear Fresher, I believe it depends on your offer letter, something like 3.05 lacks PA. Which is something near to 20–22k per month which is excuding ur PF, incentive money, TDS if any. Mostly as long u r in Academy (training period) you need not worry about tax. After you complete the training, Dovetail exams & a year of service, ur CTC will be 3.55 & then the CTC depends on your appraisal. All The Best

I was there with Cognizant for a few time and it was 2014 and i was PAT and salary was 20600 PM and 20000 variable. The same was with 2015 batch also.After 1 year you will be promoted to PA and will get 24000. But few days back i heard they have increased the salary of fresher and they are now getting 24000.
